elementSpec.desc: contains the correct form of a passage apparently erroneous in the copy text.
包含文本中看似錯誤並加以更正過後的文字。
複製されたテキストで，明かな間違いを正したところ．
contiene la forma correcta de un pasaje aparentemente erróneo en el texto de la copia.

exemplum.p: If all that is desired is to call attention to the fact that the copy text has been corrected, corr may be used alone:
exemplum.egXML: I don't know, Juan. It's so far in the past now — how can we prove or disprove anyone's theories?

exemplum.p: It is also possible to identify the individual responsible for the correction, and, using the choice and sic elements, to provide a correct reading:
exemplum.egXML: I don't know, Juan. It's so far in the past now — how we cancan we prove or disprove anyone's theories?
